type.description: The value of this property MUST be playbook.

condition.description: A boolean expression as defined in the STIX Patterning Grammar that when it evaluates as true executes the workflow step identified by the on_true property, otherwise it executes the on_false workflow step

on_true.description:
The sequential list of step IDs to be processed if the condition evaluates as true.

 

Each ID MUST represent either a CACAO workflow step object or a CACAO playbook object.

on_false.description:
The ID of the next step to be processed every time the loop condition evaluates as false. The ID MUST represent either a CACAO workflow
step object or a CACAO playbook object.
